title: Xchouxer Couch and Bed Cup Holder Pillow, Sofa Organizer Caddy for Drinks, Remotes, Phones, Snacks (Beige)
features: NO MORE SPILLS - doesn't have to set drink on the floor and knock over anymore, no more spill on your sofa and carpet, keep organized and tidy, great for daily use on couch, bed, car, RV, picnic, camping, beach and more.
INNOVATIVE DESIGN - Xchouxer sofa cup holder pillow was designed to hold more than just drinks.

PROBLEM SOLVER - no side table, no problem. Our cup pillow conveniently holds your beverage, snacks, TV remotes, eyeglasses, phones in one pillow. No more messy, a necessary living room accessory for WFH

LIFE CHANGING - a must have item for every couch potato, keep your drinks/remotes/phone within easy reach while you are lounging on your sofa. And the inner insulating foam keeps your drinks hot or cold longer.
DIMENSIONS - 13" DIA. x 3.54" H, with soft and durable removable washable cover and anti-slip base
